content:
“意料之外的事情”
​
​A turn-up for the books

If you say that something is a turn-up for the books, you mean that it is very surprising, and usually pleasing.
表达 “a turn-up for the books” 指 “意想不到的、与预期相反的事情”，多用来谈论好事情、意外的惊喜。

Julie has actually arrived at work on time – that's a turn-up for the books!
茱莉竟然准时上班了，真是太意外了！
